column2: Added test state to AccessibleName of test results entry

column3: This PR adds the state information, visually represented by icons, to the AccessibleName of the entries in the test results tree structure. It partly solves: https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-193979

It does not solve the problem of the "Hide successful tests" button not being found by tabbing through the tool window, but the most pressing problem - the test results not being immediately clear, is gone.
@forantar Just a little reminder that this exists :)
@forantar could you please have a look? This is a crucial addition, I keep running into tests - and i cannot see if they succeeded. Thanks.
@forantar, a reminder that this exists. I could really use its addition, or a similar fix. I would save me a considerable amount of time.

@forantar Does it make sense for me to fix the conflicts here? I'd really like this to be merged, as it would save me, and anyone else with a screen reader enormous amounts of time. i keep running into situations where I want to no the result of a single test run within a group of tests. But I'll only fix the conflicts if there is a chance of this being merged.
